text:
M. Chelladurai (65), a farmer of Meerankulam, was allegedly beaten to death on Wednesday. S. Murugan (45), a casual labourer, Vadakku Karaseri near Murappanadu, allegedly killed him, sources said. Murugan, who is said to be mentally disturbed, demanded Rs.200 from Chelladurai, who refused him to give.

Hence, Murugan assaulted him and dropped a boulder on his head.

On a complaint lodged by Perumal, son of the deceased, Sathankulam police have filed a case.
title: Man beaten to death
